ARABIC: وَقَالُوا۟ يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِى نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجْنُونٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They say, 'You, to whom the Reminder has been sent down, are clearly mad.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And yet they say: "You, to whom this Exposition has been sent are surely possessed of the Devil.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They say: "O you to whom the Admonition has been revealed, you are surely crazed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (The unbelievers have said), "You to whom the Quran has been revealed are insane.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they said, “O you upon whom the Qur’an has been sent, you are indeed insane.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And they say: "O you (Muhammad) to whom the Dhikr (the Qur'an) has been revealed! Verily, you are a madman!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they say: O you to whom the Reminder has been revealed! you are most surely insane:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They say: 'Thou, upon whom the Remembrance is sent down, thou art assuredly possessed!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And they say: O thou unto whom the Reminder is revealed, lo! thou art indeed a madman!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They say, "You to whom the Reminder [the Quran] has been sent down, you are surely possessed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they say: O thou unto whom the Admonition hath been sent down! verily thou art possessed.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘O you, to whom the Reminder has been sent down, you are indeed crazy.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They say: "O thou to whom the Message is being revealed! truly thou art mad (or possessed)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And they say: "O you (Muhammad SAW) to whom the Dhikr (the Quran) has been sent down! Verily, you are a mad man.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They say: 'You to whom the Remembrance is sent down, you are indeed mad.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And they said, “O you who received the message, you are insane.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [15:6] And they, that is, the disbelievers of Mecca, say, to the Prophet (s): ‘O you, to whom the Remembrance, the Qur’ān — as you claim — has been revealed, lo! you are indeed possessed!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And they) this refers to 'Abdullah Ibn Umayyah al-Makhzumi and his host who (say) to Muhammad (pbuh): (0 thou unto whom the Reminder is revealed) you who claim that Gabriel brought you the Qur'an, (lo! thou art indeed a madman!) who is inventing lies. 272
